title: MLB Network Homepage UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlb.com/network
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Network header
* MLB Network body
* MLB Network right column
* MLB footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: MLB Network Header
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network page
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the header will display the following:

* MLB Network logo
* About
* TV Schedule
* Strike Zone
* Personalities
* Watch Live
* MLB Profile Icon

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: MLB Network Body
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the page fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the body will display the following:

* Headline image and texts in the carousel
* Featured Shows section
* Latest Videos section
* More Videos link text 

THEN tapping on next/previous will able the user to navigate through the images in the carousel

THEN tapping on any Featured Shows will redirect the user to the page associated with it

THEN tapping on the video from the Latest Videos section will play the video and the video player will work as expected

THEN tapping on the More Videos link text will redirect the user to mlb.com/video/

title: MLB Network Right Column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated MLB Network homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the MLB Network right column fully loads
custom_expected:
THEN the column will display the following:

* Official MLB Network logo
* Find MLB in Your Area logo
* Today on MLB Network section (Time and Event Name)
* Connect With Us section
* Ads section
* MLB Network Newsletter section
* Tweets section

THEN tapping on Find MLB Network in Your Area will redirect the user to Get MLB Network page

THEN tapping on any of the social media icons will redirect the user to that social media's MLB Network page

THEN tapping on the ads will redirect the user to that ads' page

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the tweets in the Tweets section

THEN tapping on any tweet will redirect the user to Twitter and will open the tweet selected

title: MLB Network Logo
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to any page that the MLB Network logo is shown
custom_steps: WHEN then user taps on the MLB Network logo
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to MLB Network homepage

title: About
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers on About from the header 

WHEN the user taps on the arrow to extend the About menu in mobile
custom_expected:
THEN the following will be displayed:

* About
* Contact Us
* Customer Service FAQ
* Live Streaming FAQ
* Executive Bios
* Press Releases
* Social Media Rules

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Strike Zone
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Strike Zone from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Network Right Column
* MLB Network Strike Zone header image
* Click to watch preview link text
* Expandable element MLBN SZ TV Providers
* Upcoming section (Date, Time, and Description) 

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN tapping on Click to watch preview link text will redirect the user to mlb.com/videos/

title: Personalities
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Personalities from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Network Right Column
* Headshot of the personality
* Expandable element job title
* Social media icons (if available)

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN tapping on any of the social media icons will redirect the user to that social media's MLB Network page

title: Watch Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Watch Live from the header
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to http://m.mlb.com/network/live

title: MLB Profile - No Account Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network page

GIVEN that the user has no account logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile Icon from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to MLB login page with the following:

* MLB Logo
* Username field
* Password field
* Remember Me checkbox
* Log In button 
* Need help logging in? link text
* Sign Up link text

THEN the user will be able to fill in the fields and checkboxes

THEN the user will not be able to login if any of the inputs are invalid

THEN tapping on Need help logging in? link text will display the following help links: Forgot Password, Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Help

THEN tapping on Sign Up link text will redirect the user to Register form

title: MLB Profile - An Account Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network

GIVEN that the user has an MLB account logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile Icon from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will show the following: 

* "Welcome!" messaging
* Profile icon
* Edit Profile link text
* Logout link text 

THEN tapping on Edit Profile link text will redirect the user to MLB General Account Settings page

THEN tapping on Logout link text will log out the user across MLB pages and sites

title: About UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB Network
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on About from the header or when the user taps on About from the submenu
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Network Right Column
* About MLBN header image and description
* Studio 3 image and description
* Studio 42 image and description
* Studio K image and description
* Studio 21 image and description
* Timelapse link text for Studio 21
* Select Wardrobe Provided By section

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN tapping on Timelapse link text for Studio 21 will redirect the user to https://www.mlb.com/video/studio-21-timelapse/c-68831883?tid=7417714

THEN tapping on the sponsor logos under Select Wardrobe Provided By section will redirect to that company's page
